long_description: The compact, ultralight Marmot Kompressor Verve 26 Pack sports a simple, clean and functional design that comfortably carries everything you need for a light-and-fast day adventure. Ventilated suspension with multidirectional foam promotes cooling airflow and helps ensure your comfort while you haul a day's worth of gear. Perforated polyethylene framesheet and lightweight aluminum frame support the load and effectively transfer weight to the hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment features zippered side access as well so you can easily get to buried gear. Hydration port and clip let you add a reservoir for on-the-go hydration (reservoir sold separately). Padded hipbelt features 2 zippered pockets for a camera, GPS or snacks; mesh bottle pockets, top zip pocket and large front stash pocket let you organize and access essentials. Marmot Kompressor Verve 26 Pack features reflective hiking pole/tool loops that stow away when not in use.
short_description: The compact, ultralight Marmot Kompressor Verve 26 Pack sports a simple, clean and functional design that comfortably carries everything you need for a light-and-fast day adventure.
